/order.x-amf-description: With this endpoint a reseller can place orders at Probo and receive order information.

401.description: Unauthorized or invalid client application credentials

500.description: Bad response from authorization server, or WSDL SOAP Fault error

/order/status.x-amf-description: With this endpoint a reseller can request the status of orders placed at Probo.

401.description: Unauthorized or invalid client application credentials

500.description: Bad response from authorization server, or WSDL SOAP Fault error

/order/cancel.x-amf-description: With this endpoint a reseller can cancel multiple order placed at Probo.

cannotcancel.message: Could not cancel order, because order status is: production

failed.message: Failed to cancel order, please contact Probo

401.description: Unauthorized or invalid client application credentials

500.description: Bad response from authorization server, or WSDL SOAP Fault error

/order/release.x-amf-description: With this endpoint a reseller can release a cancelled order with their own order id, so they can place the order again with the same order id.

cannotrelease.message: Could not release order, because order status is: production

failed.message: Failed to release order, please contact Probo

401.description: Unauthorized or invalid client application credentials

500.description: Bad response from authorization server, or WSDL SOAP Fault error

shipping_methods.name: Probo-Lieferung
shipping_methods.description: Speziell für große Pakete mit einer Verpackungsgröße ab 180 cm. Für diese Pakete erhalten Sie zwischen 6:00 und 10:00 Uhr einen Track & Trace-Link in einer E-Mail. Über diesen Link können Sie sehen, in welchem Zeitfenster von zwei Stunden das Paket zugestellt wird.

de.title: Abholung Dokkum
de.description: Möchten Sie Ihre Bestellung lieber selber abholen? Dann freuen wir uns über Ihren Besuch an unsere Produktionstätte: Probo - Havelandoweg 2, 9101 PR Dokkum - Niederlande
de.short_description: Abholung Dokkum bei Probo - Havelandoweg 2, 9101 PR Dokkum - Niederlande

nl.title: Probo Afhaalpunt Dokkum
nl.description: Afhalen in Dokkum (Havelandoweg 2) tussen 06.00 en 22.00 uur.

en.title: Pickup point Dokkum
en.description: Would you like to pickup the order yourself? Then you can find us at the following address: Probo - Havelandoweg 2, 9101 PR Dokkum - The Netherlands

error_email_addresses.description: Array of email addresses which will receive status updates regarding the processing of the order.

callback_urls.description: Array of url's which will be called with status updates regarding the processing of the order.

order_type.description: Set this parameter to "test" for testing an order. When a test order is accepted, the order will be visible in your webshop account, but will not be taken into production. Default is "production"

project.description: Set this boolean to true if this is a project order.

id.description: Reseller's identification of the order. Must be unique for each order **(can be re-used when order is cancelled!)**. May only contain the following characters: a-zA-Z0-9_-

reference.description: Reseller's reference of the order. Does not have to be unique.

contact_email.description: Email of the reseller's contact person on behalf the order is placed for. A default contact email address can be set in the Reseller's webshop account settings.

language.description: The language set in the the Reseller's account is used as default, specify a different language here if necessary. Use ISO 639-1 standard. (not yet supported)

project_id.description: Resellers project group what the order relates to.

error_email_addresses.description: Array of email addresses which will receive status updates regarding the processing of the order.

callback_urls.description: \[NO IMPLEMENTATION YET\] Array of url's which will be called with status updates regarding the processing of the order.

language.description: Specify a language for the requested price

type_5.description: Single Customer API product price response

deliveries.shipping_method_description: Bezorging tussen 08.00 en 18.00 uur. Je ontvangt een track & trace link waarmee je het pakket kunt volgen. DHL geeft géén geschatte tijd van aankomst.

uri.description: A uri to a product file

first_name.description: First name of the of the addressee.

last_name.description: Last name of of the addressee.

street.description: Street name of the delivery address.

house_number.description: House number of the delivery address.

addition.description: Addition to the housenumber of the delivery address.

postal_code.description: Postal code of the delivery address.

AddressId.description: Id of the address in the addressbook (not yet supported).

id.description: Id of the external file selected via a uploader-application

uri.description: Url to the print file, allowed file formats are .pdf, .jpg and .png.

page.description: Default = 1. In case of a multipage file, the page number that should be printed has to be specified. Ignored when file is not PDF.

side.description: Default = front, will be set as default if pages property is set. Side on which the file should be printed. Possible sides are front, back.

amount.description: Default = 1, will be ignored if pages property is set. Number of times the file should be printed. The total amount of all files for a side of a product should match the product amount.

rotation.description: Default = 0. Rotation in degrees of how to print file. Possible values are 0, 90, 180, 270.

fill.description: Default = false. If image is smaller, print will be filled to fill canvas. Set to true, if you want to enable this behaviour.

fill_even.description: Default = false. If enabled files will be filled proportionally.

tiling.description: Default = none. Choose how to handle tiling. Possible values are none (dont tile), horizontal (tile horizontally), vertical (tile vertically).

mirror.description: Default = false. Set to true to mirror image.

page.description: In case of a multipage file, the page number that should be printed has to be specified.

side.description: Default = front. Side on which the file should be printed. Possible sides are front, back.

amount.description: Default = 1. For each page of a multipage file, the number of times it should be printed has to be specified.

rotation.description: Default = 0. Rotation in degrees of how to print file. Possible values are 0, 90, 180, 270.

fill.description: Default = true. If image is smaller, print will be filled to fill canvas. Set to false, if you want to disable this behaviour.

tiling.description: Default = none. Choose how to handle tiling. Possible values are none (dont tile), horizontal (tile horizontally), vertical (tile vertically).

mirror.description: Default = false. Set to true to mirror image.

value.description: Value of an option with an input option, like width or tunnel size.
